DOC.brief_title: Study FYU-981 Hyperuricemia With Without Gout
DOC.criteria: Hyperuricemic gout patient Serum urate level : > = 7.0mg/dL patient history gout , > = 8.0mg/dL patient hypertension , diabetes metabolic syndrome , > = 9.0mg/dL Gouty arthritis within two week start study treatment Secondary hyperuricemia HbA1c : > = 8.4 % Uric acidoverproduction type classification hyperuricemia History , clinically significant cardiac , hematologic hepatic disease Kidney calculi clinically significant urinary calculus eGFR : < 30mL/min/1.73m^2 Systolic blood pressure : > = 180 mmHg Diastolic blood pressure : > = 110 mmHg
